column4: to be more specific, I am running ratpoison and not gnome-session.  ifup eth0 doesn't work like it did in older versions
ifup would work if you removed network-manager and set up eth0 in /etc/network/interfaces
for now, you should be able to test with "sudo ip link set eth0 up" and then "sudo dhclient eth0", assuming that your network is using dhcp
thanks, will give it a try
